content: a free pattern for you to crochet ankle socks that fit your feet pattern download through ravelry is in english many thanks to mrsflowerpot for helping adjusting the pattern un patron gratuit pour réaliser des chaussettes de tennis adaptées à vos pieds patron disponible en français par le lien ci-dessous errata in the english version at this point you are halfway down the heel fold the heel in three mark the folding points slip-stitch your way on one third of the heel s width r 11 1 single_crochet for each single_crochet of the following third 1 slip_stitch on the first 2 single_crochet of the last third r 12 slip_stitch 2 turn 1 single_crochet for each of stitches you ve just made on previous row 1 slip_stitch on the following 2 stitches of the first third r 13 slip_stitch 2 turn 1 single_crochet for each of the stitches you ve just made on previous row 1 slip_stitch on the following 2 single_crochet of the last third
